page.title: 07LEISURE CLUBS IN KILTARLITY
page.content:
The leisure clubs in the area are centred mainly in the village hall,which is maintained by the District Council,and in Tomnacross school. In the school In village hall
yoga dancing class cubs & scouts badminton brownies & guides shinty skills S.W.R.I. youth club senior citizen's carpet bowls (lunch club) ladies keep fit
Many of the clubs and organisations are involved in fundraising for charity and community projects at various times of the year,e.g. carol singing and senior citizen's Christmas party.
